duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage SQL Server databases and ensure consistent performance on applications.
Refine and automate regular processes, track issues, and document necessary changes.
Provide support for critical production systems and offer technical mentorship to peers.
Evaluate business requirements, define problems, and develop solutions.
Participate in design and architecture discussions and document business requirements and solutions.
Update business knowledge, technical skills, and soft skills, and participate in professional organizations.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Math or equivalent
